scripts.prune-onnx: if [ "$(uname)" = "Linux" ]; then rm -rf node_modules/onnxruntime-node/bin/napi-v6/win32 node_modules/onnxruntime-node/bin/napi-v6/darwin node_modules/onnxruntime-node/bin/napi-v6/linux/arm node_modules/onnxruntime-node/bin/napi-v6/linux/arm64 node_modules/onnxruntime-node/bin/napi-v6/linux/ppc64le node_modules/onnxruntime-node/bin/napi-v6/linux/aarch64 node_modules/onnxruntime-node/bin/napi-v6/linux/s390x; else echo "skip prune-onnx (non-Linux host)"; fi
